title:
What happened to the Spirit of the Season Photo Contest that the StarNews was running?  It suddenly disappeared about a quarter of the way into the contest period from your website and the only way to continue to view/vote was to Google it outside of the StarNews.  



Not even a search on your site produces the link.



Thank you.
text:
You can still view the photo submissions and now see the winners at http://www.starnewsonline.com/holidayphotos. 



If you have any problems accessing that URL, you can also go directly to http://starnewsonline.upickem.net/engine/Welcome.aspx?contestid=198992.
